name: Bubble Tea: game for thinking and imagination
name_original: Bubble Tea: game for thinking and imagination
description:
- Have fun with game that made from RPG Maker Mv
- Walk around the map to explore the world wide
- Collect item from the scenes to solve puzzles
- Use 100% 200% 300% of your brain
- Fight with enemies like turn-based rpg game
- Meet NPC character
- Deadly trap that invite you to load save
